title: SICAI: Stromal-Immune Coupled Attractor Index â€” Code and Data for Psoriasis Spatial Transcriptomics Analysis
description: Computational framework for quantifying stromal-immune coupling architecture from spatial transcriptomics data. This repository contains the complete analysis pipeline for the manuscript 'Geometric Stability Decomposition of Stromal-Immune Coupling Reveals Mast Cell Hub Architecture and Severity-Linked CD8+ TRM Attractor in Psoriasis'.
